summary: AN ORDINANCE related to land use and zoning; amending Exhibit A to Ordinance 121831 to clarify that certain property at Plat 40E, page 111, of the Official Land Use Map is rezoned from Major Institution Overlay with a 105 foot height limit/Neighborhood Commercial with a 65 foot height limit (MIO-105'/NC3 65') to Major Institution Overlay with a 105 foot height limit/Neighborhood Commercial/Residential with a 40 foot height limit (MIO-105'/NC3/R 40').
